items.text: length ball on off stump, punched on the up towards mid-off but Mortaza lunges to his left and stops in his follow through
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: short outside off, keeps low too. Looks to pull and gets it off the inside edge to deep square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, opens the face and runs it straight to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: short ball outside off, shuffles and whips straight to deep square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: overpitched ball down leg side, can't get bat on it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, 1 wide

items.text: overpitched outside off, looks to drill this through cover but gets it off the toe-end
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, sliced to point's right
items.postText:
Dilip: "With the shots rashid has in his armoury he should have been send out here,it would be too late for him later on."

Top over from Mortaza. 69 off 48 still looks gettable, but Shakib is marking his run-up now.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, drives with the angle to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: drilled flat and straight! What a shot. Length on middle stump, down the track and a sweet swerving hit brought about by the turn of his hips
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, SIX runs

items.text: straight to extra cover. Pummels another full ball but can't place this one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, thick edge to short third man's left
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside leg stump, a laboured reverse-sweep to deep cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, nudged into the leg side with soft hands
items.postText: Avik Aravind : "Is it just me or is there anyone else that agrees that Rashid Khan should have come in as a pinch hitter" --- SpaceX has just received a message from Mars asking for this.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: beaten. Slower ball slides low from a length outside off. Looks to slap it on the up but he's done by Mashrafe
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, allows it to come on and picks it to deep square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: bowled him! Mashrafe delivers again. Another slower ball from around the wicket. Shahidi gets down for the ramp. Through the shot too early. It's the right line and length for the shot, but he doesn't anticipate the change in pace. It deflects off the front pad onto off stump
items.postText: James De Lamber: "This one's looking tense... you'd think it's advantage Afghanistan but Bangladesh are holding their nerve here!"
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, OUT

dismissal.text: Hashmatullah Shahidi  b Mashrafe Mortaza 71 (99b 5x4 0x6) SR: 71.71

items.text: length at off stump, mistimed tap to extra cover
items.postText: Vinil Sukhraman: "All the people asking for Rashid haven't followed Afghanistan cricket for more than 6 months. Not long ago, Nabi used to be Afghanistan's best batsman. He's got the shots, but more importantly, he's got the temperament. He's calm as a monk"
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: short ball slanted into the corridor. Looks to play the cut but there isn't room. He's beaten on the under-edge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, thick inside edge as he lines up the pull. Can't get it past midwicket
items.postText: Another great over from Mortaza. He's just got 250 wickets. 249 of those are for Bangladesh, one for Asia XI. What a spell it's been: 3-0-15-2
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: good shot, but it's a big ground. Long-off gets across to his left to cut this drive against a full ball
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 2 runs

items.text: arm ball at a length outside off. He hasn't picked it. Looks to drive through cover but this slides in and goes off the inside edge. To his advantage in the end because no one is in the circle on the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 2 runs

items.text: review for an lbw decision that's been given out. Shenwari is caught on the flap trying to play the reverse sweep. There is an angle in on this, but middle and off are visible. There's no bat on it...it's sliding down leg! Wow that looked an unlikley result but Shenwari survives. Won't get the runs though...
items.postText: Manav : "I like the maturity of Afghanistan team, any other team would have rushed Rashid to be an all rounder overnight but this team know their strength and doesn't tickle with the batting order prematurely. Pretty good signs these."
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: length ball pushed through flat and he cops this on the pad as he goes deep to try and tickle this fine
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: can't get it past midwicket. Shakib pushing it faster and faster. Yorker length and he gets a thick inside edge on the slog
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: another inside edge as he looks to slog. Full and fast, runs behind square leg
items.postText:
51 off 30. Will Mortaza hand it to Mustafiz so that he can get three out of him? Yes he does. Changes his mind at the last moment after getting to the top of his mark.

UB: "@Manav - respectfully. Sending Rashid ahead of an all rounder in the 44th isnt entirely premature given the required rr. They use him like a pinch hitter. Subtle difference, eh?"
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 2 runs
